concept_page.title: The Clubtify Philosophy
concept_page.subtitle: A social platform designed for meaningful shared spaces.
concept_page.stand_1_title: No Ads. No Tracking. No Data Selling.
concept_page.stand_1_desc: Your data is used only to improve content relevance within the platform and only from information you choose to provide.
concept_page.stand_2_desc: No recommendation traps, no behavioral tracking outside the platform.
concept_page.stand_3_desc: $1/month per user. This keeps the platform independent and community-funded instead of ad-driven.
concept_page.stand_4_desc: Major decisions inside clubs are based on group voting and shared responsibility.
concept_page.paid_p1: The platform does not rely on advertising or surveillance economics.
concept_page.paid_p2: Users are not treated as a product.
concept_page.paid_p3: Community rules remain independent from commercial pressure.
concept_page.paid_p4: If you continue after the trial, the price is $1/month. If not, you can stop using the platform — no tricks, no hidden conditions.
concept_page.early_p1: 3 months of free usage when Clubtify launches
concept_page.early_p2: A permanent 'Early Member' badge on your profile, marking you as part of the first generation of supporters.
concept_page.early_note: This badge does not grant special privileges — it is a historical mark of contribution and trust.
concept_page.privacy_4: Email is used only for account and launch notifications

terms_page.title: Data & Transparency Notice
terms_page.subtitle: Scope: This notice applies only to the Clubtify landing page and information you voluntarily submit here.
terms_page.scope_note: It does not cover the internal platform or future services, which will have separate terms and privacy policies.
terms_page.s1_intro: On this landing page, we may collect:
terms_page.s1_item1: Your email address (if you join the waitlist or request updates)
terms_page.s1_item2: Your region/country (used solely to determine where your data resides legally)
terms_page.s1_item3: Minimal interaction data (e.g., form submissions, page visits for reliability and security)
terms_page.s1_note: We do not collect sensitive personal information or behavioral profiling data.
terms_page.s2_intro: We use the data only for:
terms_page.s2_item1: Contacting you regarding early access, product updates, or launch information.
terms_page.s2_item2: Understanding overall interest in Clubtify to guide product direction.
terms_page.s2_note: Country-level information is used only for launch planning and legal compliance.
terms_page.s2_desc: We do not use this information for advertising, remarketing, or third-party tracking.
terms_page.s3_title: 3. No Ads, No Data Resale, No Hidden Purposes
terms_page.s3_item1: We do not sell, rent, or trade your information
terms_page.s3_item2: We do not share data with advertisers or data brokers
terms_page.s3_item3: We do not use marketing trackers for profiling or retargeting
terms_page.s3_desc: Analytics, if any, are minimal, product-performance oriented, and do not identify individual users.
terms_page.s4_desc: If we use service providers (e.g., email, hosting), they process data only to support this landing page and must comply with applicable laws. We require data processing agreements where applicable.
terms_page.s5_desc: Providing information is optional. You may request removal of your email or data at any time by contacting: support@clubtify.com We will process removal requests promptly.
terms_page.s6_desc: We may disclose minimal information only to comply with applicable laws, security, or abuse-prevention requests.
terms_page.s7_desc: We may update this notice to reflect changes in how data is handled. We encourage you to review this notice periodically.
terms_page.cta_desc: For any questions or concerns about this notice, please contact us.
